body_html:
I have same problem on Python 3.6.2 / Pytorch 0.4.0.
and I tried to above all approach switching pin_memory, changing size of shared memory, and i use skiamge library(i am not using cv2!!), but I still have problem.

this problem raise randomly. controlling this problem is just watching console and restarting training.

body:
I have same problem on Python 3.6.2 / Pytorch 0.4.0.
and I tried to above all approach switching pin_memory, changing size of shared memory, and i use skiamge library(i am not using cv2!!), but I still have problem.

this problem raise randomly. controlling this problem is just watching console and restarting training.
